text: The Boatlift is the third studio album from Miami rapper Pitbull. It was released on November 27, 2007. The singles are "Sticky Icky", "Secret Admirer", "Go Girl" and "The Anthem". The album debuted at number 50 with first-week sales of 22,203 copies, well below expectations. Second week sales fell to 9,686 copies sold, and a chart drop to number 134, bringing the unit total to 32,084.Hip Hop Album Sales: Week Ending 12/9/07 | Hip Hop News > HipHopDX.com == Track listing == # Title Producer(s) Featured guest(s) Length 1 "A Little Story (Intro)" Wrek 1:08 2 "Go Girl" Soundz Trina and Young Bo$$ 3:49 3 "Dukey Love" Mr. Collipark Trick Daddy and Fabo 3:45 4 "I Don't See 'Em" Tru Cubo and AIM 3:59 5 "Midnight" Vein Casely 3:32 6 "Ying & the Yang" Lil Jon 3:27 7 "The Anthem" Lil Jon Lil Jon 4:05 8 "The Truth (Interlude)" 0:54 9 "Candyman" Brown Thugz Twista 3:11 10 "Sticky Icky" Lil Jon Jim Jones 4:42 11 "My Life" Drop & Deadbeats Jason Derulo 3:44 12 "Secret Admirer" Play-N-Skillz Lloyd 3:18 13 "Get Up/Levantate" Play-N-Skillz 3:17 14 "Fuego (DJ Budda Remix)" Mr. Collipark Don Omar 3:49 15 "Stripper Pole (Remix)" Eddie Perez Toby Love 3:56 16 "Un Poquito" 110% pure Yung Berg 3:42 17 "Tell Me (Remix)" Lil Jon Frankie J and Ken-Y 4:34 18 "Mr. 305 (Outro)" 0:45 ==References== Category:2007 albums
